pages.title: 蒸柜
pages.text: <item>蒸柜/$是<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/fluid)蒸汽/$供能的快速版烟熏炉。它每 50 tick 能烹饪一个食物物品（每秒 4 个物品）。运行时，它以 200 mB/t 消耗<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/fluid)蒸汽/$并产出等量的<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/fluid)蒸馏水/$。$(br2)<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/fluid)蒸汽/$可以从底面或侧面输入，<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/fluid)蒸馏水

<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/fluid)/$可以从顶面输出。$(br2)总的来说，<item>蒸柜/$每摄氏度<thing>$(l:crossroads:intro/heat)热量/$的工作效率是$(l:crossroads:heat/smelter)<item>冶炼炉/$的两倍，工作速度也是$(l:crossroads:heat/smelter)<item>冶炼炉/$最高速度的两倍。$(br2)<thing>$(l:essentials/circuits#reader)读取器电路/$可测量输入槽的充满程度。$(br2)
